name: Sleepless Night
description:
Your nightmare haunts you every night, but... are they really nightmares?
You better survive them!

You play the role of a child facing three monsters during the night, your goal being to spend the night while escaping them:
feed the monster under the bed and turn off the light (it only tolerates light for a short time), hide from the monster in the hallway, don't move in front of the monster of the window, and don't forget to get some sleep, the monster under the bed feeds on your weariness.

Respond to the mysterious child who leaves you notes to help each other and, perhaps, overcome this endless spiral of nightmares.

You are afraid of the dark, so you sleep better with the light on.
